item.title: Looking for someone to shoot a 1-2 hour interview in Fort Wayne Indiana - Upwork
item.description:
I need someone to film a 1-2 hour interview for a video game documentary. Need someone with a camera that shoots 4K, has pro sound capability and a knowledge of interviews. No editing, just sending footage.

Budget: $150
Posted On: June 29, 2024 02:46 UTC
Category: Videography
Skills:People, Videography, Video Editing
Skills: People, Videography, Video Editing
Location Requirement: Only freelancers located in the United States may apply.
Country: United States
click to apply
